price: Na hiki Kitabu, tumekuteremshia wewe, kimebarikiwa, ili wazizingatie Aya zake, na wawaidhike wenye akili.
arabic: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Hichi tulicho kuteremshia ni Kitabu chenye manufaa mengi, ili wenye akili nzuri na nyoyo za kufahamu wapate kuzielewa Aya zake, na wawaidhike kwazo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka mubārakun liyaddabbarū āyātihi waliyatadhakkara ulū al-albābi
